channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Davos Won’t Save Us From AI. The Boardroom Might Be Our Last Hope
item.description: Governments can't regulate AI in time. Tech firms are too big to fail. If AI governance happens at all, it will happen in the boardroom, the last inst...

item.title: There Are 16 Types Of ‘Adventure-Seekers’ — Which One Are You? A Psychologist Explains
item.description: Adventure-seeking is more nuanced than you think. Here's how to decode your own adventurer's style.

item.title: New Security Vulnerability Database Launches In The EU
item.description: A new vulnerability database has launched in the EU, in a bid to reduce dependence on the U.S. program. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Wednesday, January 21
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Chris Pratt Wants To Play The Punisher
item.description: In promoting his new movie Mercy, Chris Pratt says that his dream role would be playing The Punisher after years of playing Star-Lord.

item.title: The empathy of instructions

item.title: Fake news and trust
